isis.stitle: CAB: 4100, 4200, 4300 AND 4400 MODELS - INSTALL - CAB DOOR WINDOW SLIDE BLOCK

svcsubproc.title: Install Front Cab Door Window Slide Block on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models

note.para: It is not necessary to replace the plastic retaining tab broken off to remove the front cab door window slide block from the front cab door window slide rail.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 62
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Check cab door window slide block (Item 3) for ware or damage, if worn or damaged, replace it. Working through the cab door access opening, slide the cab door window slide block (Item 3) into the cab door window slide rail (Item 4), driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 60
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Working through the cab door access opening (Item 8), carefully push window regulator arm (Item 10) into the cab door window slide block (Item 11) in the cab door window slide rail (Item 12), driver side shown.

Install front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For installing front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Install Front Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models.

Install front cab door trim panel, refer to CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If front cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks. If front cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Install Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side front cab door window slide block.

svcsubproc.title: Install Rear Cab Door Window Slide Block on Crew Cab for all Models

note.para: It is not necessary to replace the plastic retaining tab broken off to remove the rear cab door window slide block from the rear cab door window slide rail.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 63
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Working through the cab door access opening, slide the cab door window slide block (Item 3) into the cab door window slide rail (Item 4), driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 61
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Working through the cab door access opening (Item 8), carefully push window regulator arm (Item 10) into the cab door window slide block (Item 11) in the cab door window slide rail (Item 12), driver side shown.

Install rear cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For installing rear cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Crew Cab for all Models.

Install rear cab door trim panel, refer to CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If rear cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks. If rear cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side rear cab door window slide block.
